poem:
Knighthoods in Morning Light  

The hum of politics sings  
in distant rooms,  
where trade maps unfold  
like whispered promises.  

Honors drip from headlines,  
names etched in print—  
a fleeting currency.  

Yet beneath the gilded names,  
the quiet march of civil hands  
keeps the world turning,  
like pages in a news  
tale unfinished.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "UK must improve trading relationships, Reeves says ahead of Europe trip – politics live 2.11pm BST James Cleverly, Jeremy Hunt, Grant Shapps and Mel Stride to receive knighthoods – reports Rishi Sunak’s resignation honours list is being confirmed today. Knighthoods are reported to be going to several senior figures from his time in government: Andrew Mitchell, James Cleverly, Jeremy Hunt, Grant Shapps and Mel Stride. More details soon … 2.06pm BST Civil servants in 16". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: UK must improve trading relationships, Reeves says ahead of Europe trip – politics live 2.11pm BST James Cleverly, Jeremy Hunt, Grant Shapps and Mel Stride to receive knighthoods – reports Rishi Sunak’s resignation honours list is being confirmed today. Knighthoods are reported to be going to several senior figures from his time in government: Andrew Mitchell, James Cleverly, Jeremy Hunt, Grant Shapps and Mel Stride. More details soon … 2.06pm BST Civil servants in 16
